What happens if the token doesn't launch after I park my conversion?

The question is flawed because it assumes that if the token doesn't launch, something else will happen. According to the text, if the token launches, you will either find 0.975 GOLD in your wallet, or you will have your VRSCTEST back. It doesn't mention what happens if the token doesn't launch.
